abstract: Guerrilla organization the Group of Popular Rebels claims responsibility for December shooting at Israeli embassy in Athens.
lead_paragraph: In the December assault, gunmen opened fire on the Israeli Embassy in a suburb of Athens, raking the building with bullets but causing no injuries.

headline.main: Greek Guerrilla Group Claims Responsibility for Attack on Israeli Embassy

snippet: In the December assault, gunmen opened fire on the Israeli Embassy in a suburb of Athens, raking the building with bullets but causing no injuries.
